name: GitHub Copilot
description: AI-powered code completion tool developed by GitHub and OpenAI that suggests full lines or entire functions inside supported editors.
useCase: Code completion, boilerplate generation, in-line suggestions.

name: Tabnine
description: AI coding assistant that learns your codebase and provides intelligent completions with an emphasis on privacy and local models.
useCase: Smart auto-completion, faster coding with team-trained AI models.

name: Cursor IDE
description: An AI-native IDE that deeply integrates language models to assist in code generation, debugging, and refactoring.
useCase: AI-driven code navigation, refactor suggestions, and rapid iteration.

name: Sourcegraph Cody
description: A powerful AI code assistant for enterprise-level codebases, enabling context-aware completions and large-scale refactoring.
useCase: Code search, repo understanding, automated refactoring.

name: Codeium
description: Free AI code assistant that provides smart suggestions, explanations, and code documentation across multiple languages.
useCase: Code completion, documentation generation, explanation.

name: Replit Ghostwriter
description: Replit's built-in AI assistant that helps write, debug, and explain code directly in the browser IDE.
useCase: Browser-based prototyping and AI pair programming.

name: Claude Code
description: Anthropic’s AI coding assistant that understands broad project context and assists with code writing and explanations.
useCase: Code generation, bug fixing, context-aware assistance.

name: JetBrains AI Assistant

useCase: AI assistance directly inside IntelliJ, WebStorm, and other JetBrains IDEs.

name: Amazon CodeWhisperer
description: Amazon’s AI code generator that integrates with IDEs to provide code completions and security scanning for AWS developers.
useCase: Generate code for AWS services, scan for vulnerabilities.

name: Blackbox AI
description: AI tool that enables developers to copy code snippets from videos, generate code, and perform smart search across repos.
useCase: Search, extract, and generate code using AI.

name: Aider
description: An open-source command-line tool that lets you talk to your codebase using GPT models and apply changes automatically.
useCase: Chat-driven code refactoring and CLI-based code edits.

name: Continue.dev

useCase: Inline chatting, refactoring, and quick AI Q&A inside IDE.

name: Pieces for Developers

name: Zed AI Assistant

useCase: Collaborative coding, real-time AI completions, pair sessions.

name: Visual Studio Code

name: AdGuard AdBlocker

name: User-Agent Switcher

name: Keycloak
description: Open-source identity and access management solution developed by Red Hat.
useCase: Add SSO, MFA, and role-based access control to enterprise apps.

name: AWS Cognito
description: AWS service providing secure user authentication and access control for web and mobile apps.
useCase: Add user pools, tokens, and identity federation using AWS ecosystem.

name: HashiCorp Vault
description: Tool for securely storing and accessing secrets, API keys, and sensitive data.
useCase: Manage and encrypt credentials, tokens, and secrets at scale.

name: 1Password Teams
description: Password manager for businesses with team sharing and encryption controls.
useCase: Securely share credentials and manage secrets within teams.

name: Bitwarden
description: Open-source password manager with self-hosting and enterprise options.
useCase: Store and share passwords securely across devices.

name: Snyk
description: Developer-first platform for scanning open-source dependencies and fixing vulnerabilities.
useCase: Detect and remediate security issues in code and Docker images.

name: SonarQube
description: Continuous inspection tool for code quality and security vulnerabilities.
useCase: Integrate static analysis to enforce clean code and prevent bugs.

name: Trivy
description: Open-source vulnerability scanner for containers, Kubernetes, and other artifacts, by Aqua Security.
useCase: Identify known vulnerabilities and misconfigurations in container images, file systems, and code repositories early in the development cycle.

name: OWASP ZAP
description: Open-source web application security scanner maintained by the OWASP community.
useCase: Detect common web vulnerabilities like XSS and SQLi.

name: Burp Suite
description: Comprehensive web vulnerability scanner and penetration testing toolkit.
useCase: Find and exploit security flaws in web applications.

name: Cloudflare Security
description: Suite of security features including WAF, DDoS protection, and bot mitigation.
useCase: Protect web applications and APIs from online threats.

name: Let's Encrypt
description: Free certificate authority that automates SSL/TLS certificate issuance.
useCase: Add HTTPS encryption to websites for free.

name: Acunetix
description: Automated web vulnerability scanner for detecting over 7,000 security issues.
useCase: Scan web applications for OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities.

name: Dependabot
description: GitHub-integrated security tool that automatically updates vulnerable dependencies.
useCase: Automate security patches for package dependencies.

name: GitGuardian
description: Secrets detection platform that monitors public and private code repositories to prevent sensitive credential leaks.
useCase: Automatically scan commits, CI pipelines, and container images for API keys, secrets, and misconfigurations to alert developers.

name: Wireshark
description: Open-source network protocol analyzer that lets you capture and inspect traffic in real time.
useCase: Debug network communications, analyze protocols, and troubleshoot connectivity or security issues by examining packet data.

name: ChatGPT
description: OpenAI’s conversational AI for writing, brainstorming, coding, and task automation.
useCase: Assist with writing, research, and general productivity using natural language.

name: Claude
description: Anthropic’s AI assistant designed for safe, context-aware reasoning and text generation.
useCase: Summarization, document writing, and general-purpose reasoning.

name: Google Gemini
description: Google’s multimodal AI assistant for search, workspace integration, and creative tasks.
useCase: Integrate AI into Gmail, Docs, and Sheets for enhanced productivity.

name: Perplexity AI
description: AI-powered search assistant that combines web results with conversational answers.
useCase: Get accurate, cited answers with real-time web search.

name: Notion AI
description: Built into Notion, this assistant helps generate, summarize, and structure notes and docs.
useCase: Automate documentation and writing tasks inside Notion workspaces.

name: Microsoft Copilot
description: AI integrated into Microsoft 365 to assist with Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Teams.
useCase: Generate summaries, automate spreadsheets, and enhance presentations.

name: Slack AI
description: AI built into Slack for summarizing threads, generating replies, and finding information.
useCase: Enhance team communication and reduce chat noise.

name: Zoom AI Companion
description: AI assistant inside Zoom that summarizes meetings and generates follow-ups.
useCase: Save time by automating notes and key takeaways from meetings.

name: Otter.ai
description: AI meeting transcription tool that generates summaries and searchable transcripts.
useCase: Record, transcribe, and review meetings and lectures efficiently.

name: Fireflies.ai
description: AI meeting assistant that records, transcribes, and summarizes voice conversations.
useCase: Automate note-taking for meetings and calls.

name: Trello with Butler AI
description: AI automation tool within Trello boards for automating repetitive project tasks.
useCase: Streamline task management through AI-powered triggers and actions.

name: ClickUp Brain
description: AI assistant integrated into ClickUp for summarizing tasks, writing docs, and automating workflows.
useCase: Accelerate productivity with project-level AI suggestions.

name: Airtable AI
description: AI features in Airtable to summarize data, predict values, and automate tasks.
useCase: Use AI formulas and workflows inside structured databases.

name: Miro AI
description: Built-in AI assistant for Miro that generates ideas, organizes boards, and summarizes discussions.
useCase: Accelerate brainstorming and collaboration sessions.

name: Canva Magic Studio
description: AI design suite within Canva that generates images, presentations, and videos.
useCase: Create marketing materials with text-to-image and auto-design tools.

name: ChatDOC
description: AI document assistant that lets you chat directly with PDFs, Word files, and other documents.
useCase: Extract, summarize, and query long documents instantly.

name: Gamma App
description: AI presentation creator that turns outlines or notes into visual slides instantly.
useCase: Generate presentations quickly with AI-based design automation.

name: Tome
description: AI storytelling and presentation platform that creates visual narratives from prompts.
useCase: Build engaging pitch decks or visual stories using AI.

name: Docusaurus
description: Open-source static site generator by Meta for building modern documentation websites using Markdown and React.
useCase: Create beautiful documentation with versioning and search support.

name: GitBook
description: Collaborative documentation platform that integrates Markdown editing, versioning, and team publishing.
useCase: Host product or developer documentation with team collaboration.

name: ReadMe
description: Interactive API documentation platform with dynamic examples and metrics dashboards.
useCase: Build interactive API hubs and manage developer onboarding.

name: MkDocs
description: Lightweight static site generator for building documentation from Markdown files.
useCase: Generate fast, simple docs with YAML configuration.

name: Swagger UI
description: Open-source API documentation interface for exploring and testing OpenAPI specifications.
useCase: Visualize and test REST APIs interactively.

name: Stoplight
description: Collaborative API design and documentation platform supporting OpenAPI and governance workflows.
useCase: Design and maintain API contracts with documentation and testing.

name: Slate
description: Static API documentation generator for clean, developer-friendly REST API docs.
useCase: Generate elegant API documentation from Markdown and YAML.

name: Redoc
description: Powerful open-source renderer for OpenAPI/Swagger documentation with clean UI.
useCase: Render OpenAPI specs into interactive API documentation pages.

name: Typora
description: Minimalist Markdown editor with live preview and export options.
useCase: Write and format documentation locally with live preview.

name: Confluence
description: Atlassian’s enterprise wiki and documentation tool for team collaboration.
useCase: Centralize knowledge sharing and documentation across teams.

name: Notion
description: All-in-one workspace for note-taking, documentation, and project collaboration.
useCase: Maintain living documents, wikis, and product knowledge bases.

name: Obsidian
description: Local Markdown-based knowledge management tool with graph visualization.
useCase: Organize research notes and personal documentation with backlinks.

name: Docsify
description: Open-source documentation site generator that renders Markdown files on the fly.
useCase: Create lightweight single-page documentation websites.

name: BookStack
description: Open-source self-hosted wiki platform for organizing documentation like a digital library.
useCase: Create internal wikis or team documentation on your own server.

name: Coda
description: Document and data platform that blends text, tables, and automation.
useCase: Build interactive documents for team knowledge and project tracking.

name: Document360
description: Knowledge base software for creating public and private product documentation.
useCase: Build professional documentation portals for customers or teams.

name: Archbee
description: Documentation and wiki platform optimized for developer teams.
useCase: Collaborate on developer-focused product and API documentation.

name: Read the Docs
description: Open-source platform for hosting and automating documentation builds.
useCase: Automatically publish and version open-source documentation.

name: Elasticsearch
description: Distributed open-source search and analytics engine built on Apache Lucene.
useCase: Full-text search, log analytics, and real-time data exploration.

name: Meilisearch
description: Lightning-fast, open-source search engine with RESTful API and instant search results.
useCase: Add fast, typo-tolerant search to web and mobile apps.

name: Algolia
description: Powerful hosted search API for building real-time search experiences with instant results.
useCase: Provide high-speed, relevance-tuned search for websites and e-commerce apps.

name: Typesense
description: Open-source search engine optimized for simplicity and performance.
useCase: Deliver fast and typo-tolerant search similar to Algolia, but self-hosted.

name: OpenSearch
description: Community-driven fork of Elasticsearch with added features for analytics and security.
useCase: Enterprise-grade search and observability stack.

name: Pinecone
description: Managed vector database designed for semantic and AI-powered search.
useCase: Enable similarity and embedding-based search in AI applications.

name: Weaviate
description: Open-source vector database for semantic search and generative AI applications.
useCase: Build semantic and hybrid search engines with vector embeddings.

name: Qdrant
description: Open-source vector database for similarity search and AI-driven recommendations.
useCase: Implement hybrid search for ML or RAG pipelines.

name: Milvus
description: Highly scalable open-source vector database for AI search and recommendation systems.
useCase: Store and query billions of embeddings efficiently.

name: Redis Search
description: Module of Redis providing real-time full-text search and secondary indexing.
useCase: Integrate ultra-fast in-memory search into applications.

name: Solr
description: Enterprise search platform from Apache Lucene offering advanced text search capabilities.
useCase: Build scalable full-text and faceted search systems.

name: Vespa
description: Yahoo’s open-source engine for big data serving, search, and recommendations.
useCase: Power recommendation systems and large-scale search backends.

name: Elastic App Search
description: Elastic’s hosted search service providing easy integration for web and mobile apps.
useCase: Add enterprise-grade search without managing infrastructure.

name: Whoosh
description: Pure Python search library providing fast, lightweight text indexing.
useCase: Add local full-text search without external dependencies.

name: Zilliz Cloud
description: Managed vector database service built around Milvus for enterprise-scale AI search.
useCase: Run scalable vector search for AI apps without infrastructure management.

name: Typesense Cloud
description: Managed cloud hosting for Typesense search clusters with scaling and analytics.
useCase: Deploy and manage hosted full-text search clusters easily.

name: Lucene
description: Core open-source search library that powers Solr and Elasticsearch.
useCase: Embed custom search functionality into Java applications.

name: Jina AI
description: Neural search framework for building multimodal and AI-native search systems.
useCase: Enable cross-modal search using text, image, or audio embeddings.

name: Chroma
description: Open-source embedding vector database and retrieval library for building AI applications with memory.
useCase: Store and index text or multimedia embeddings to enable semantic search and retrieval-augmented generation.
